title: Mobile development
desc: I need an Android and Ios app.  I already have a design for it, I just need it to be built.  In the frame of developing one of our current businesses, we need to develop a Mobile Application both in iOS and Android.We have experience with Ionic 3 and Firebase and we are looking for front end and back end developers able to work with the framework.The target is to develop a straight forward application which ables user to select picture, edit text and message and send the report for print in our servers.we want the following feature UI/UX in our software :1.	Login sign in button using Google Auth and Facebook Auth.2.	Credit system for pay for paying reports.3.	Order history features.4.	About Report features (to be detailed).5.	Customizing report features (type of report, adding,location, title, message, address)6.	Saving report.8.	Contact List feature.9. Process reports and send for print after credit pay.In order to apply for the job, please :- provide a detailed schedule with the appropriate milestones- Describe how you imagine handling feature 9- Detailed cost.any other document you deem necessary.Any application not providing the requirements above will be ignored.Any application showing lenght of 1 month+ will be rejected.Bonuses going up to 80% of the agreed lump sum will be offered if :-Product is bug-free.-Product match the requirements.-Product is delivered on less than 3 weeks.one cannot pretend to bonuses while :- Delivering 1 line of code on time.- Delivering product matching the requirement but working only 1 times out of 10.- Delivering a bug free product on time but not matching our requirements.That is to mention, bonuses will be given case by case.Thanks and Good luck !We look forward to work with you :)

title: Andriod and IOS App for Scanning Phone Top-up cards
desc: Hello,App DescriptionQuick Recharge is a ‘Quick’, reliable, convenient way to top-up your airtime balance without the hassle of entering all the 13 numbers manually. Users can now use their camera to effortlessly top-up by simply hovering the camera above the recharge number. Once the app reads the numbers it will automatically dial them for youI need an app that would scan the number from prepaid phone topup card (from scratch card or receipt) and have a place for GoogleAdsesnse it to generate income.Functions:1. Using the camera and OCR engine, the app will scan the number sequence.2. The app will ask the user to topup or transfer the fund to other phone number2a. Topup: the app will add prefix (eg, *113*) and suffix(eg. #) to the scanned number. And insert the whole sequence to phone Dial and dial it.2b. Transfer: the app will ask the phone number to transfer. Then it will add the prefix/suffix to the scanned number according to the choice of service carrier. And insert the whole sequence to phone Dial and dial it.My main requirement is that the OCR scanning has to be flawless and powerful. The whole app is about providing an effortless and quick solution so people don't have to enter all the numbers manually.Extra: I would like the app to generate income through ads but also through providing a service/connivence fee (say K0.45). I am open to hearing your recommendation on this and if it is possible or if its something I have to discuss with the telecom provider. Also, if you know other ways for the app to generate income.Bonus for you: if you can recommend any other way to make use of downloaded user information (by asking permission first, of course), and other ways to make money from a free app.I have attached two files which provide further details about the app.Please ask any question you might have.I am currently living in Zambia, Africa but studied in America. So, this app is for the African market (hence the currency I used [K0.45], that is the Zambian currency.Please feel free to ask any question you might have.P.s I have other apps I would like to start as well so depending on the quality of work, I am ready to start them.

title: Poker Training App (for Android)
desc: Android Application Overview:Hi,I'm looking to develop an app to help me memorize poker hand ranges.I’ve put together a sketch in the attachments below to help you visualize what I need to be developed. I will try my best to describe the features and functionality of the application in the following paragraphs but feel free to send me any questions to help clarify the project requirements.Apps You Can Download to See similar examples:- Poker Hands Trainer (Game Play)- PkrCruncher (Select Range)Functionality:What is the Purpose of the Application:The actual ‘game’ screen will look like a poker table. Two random cards from a preselected range will appear on the screen. I have the option to ‘Call’ or ‘Fold’ the cards. If I choose the correct answer I win $10. If I choose the wrong answer I lose $30.The preselected range will come from the settings in the sub-folders. Where I choose what cards are the correct answer and what cards are the wrong answer.In the back end, the game will need to generate random cards from a deck of 52 eliminating the ones that are not in the range of correct or wrong answers.The Game will randomly generate two cards from the selected ranges.There will be a total of 169 Cards Ranges to choose from in the game which can be saved in the subfolders. See image “Card Ranges”‘AKs’ Represents Ace, King - Suited = For example: Ace of Hearts & King of Hearts.‘AKo Represents Ace, King - Offsuit = For example: Ace of Hearts & King of Clubs. ’How many different screens will be required in the mobile app:The App will require about 6 screen templates made up of folders with similar functions. (- See attachments)I will need the option to create new folders and subfolders to save and play different hand ranges.If this sounds interesting to you please get in touch and send me your questions.Thank you.

title: Android app and smart watch (easy and fast)
desc: I need an Android app. I would like it designed and built. and a smart watch app.The application will be developed as an android application, and it will connect with smart watch to detect body vitals like: heart rate, ECG monitoring, blood pressure, blood glucose and blood oxygen.The app will monitor the user vital signs such as heart attack, cardiac arrest, (high - low) blood pressure, (high –low) blood glucose or low level of blood oxygen.Also the system detect location of the users .The system have 2 users types:The volunteer and general user.First the volunteer will sign up with his ID (10 digits)and passwordThen enter his information : Name, mobile number ,date of birth, country ,city , Job ,Do you have a:□ Medical license□ First aid licenseThe  Certificate:Later he can sign in then can recive any notification about emergency situationThe general user:First the user sign up with his ID and passwordThen enter his information : name, mobile number, date of birth, country ,cityRelatives information each one his name and phone number as emergency contactIn case of emergency the application will release alarm with case explanation in the phone screen and notifies the emergency center (sms) along with the user location. In addition to relatives’ notification with the user location.; by sms.Although the application will notify the nearest volunteers about emergency situation depending on their current location.

title: Write an iPhone application
desc: Its an app to enter and follow match predictions for different users, for a sport tournament.The app interface should be in spanish.The apps must be native to each platform (android and iphone).The apps must fulfill playstore(android) and app store (iphone) policies.The app should allow registering through manual registration or social networks.Similar app:[url removed, login to view][url removed, login to view]User select sport, and then tournament. If already authorized by administrator, has the option to:1. Enter the predictions for every match in the tournament.2. Verify or change previously entered predictions, if the locking time previous to the match hasn't pass.3. See there predictions vs real scores on past matches.4. See the point table of all users in their group based on predictions vs real scores rules.5. Check news posted by administrator.Administrators should be able to:1. Create groups of users based on email addresses.2. Send invites and approve users on tournaments based on email addresses.3. Create a "polla" or prediction group, associating:- A name- A tournament API provider and ID (Tournament information obtained via API. Ex: [url removed, login to view] )- An existing group of users.- A set of rules (see below)- Logo (uploaded png, jpg or gif).4. Define rules for each "polla", indicating:- Points obtained by a user if his prediction matched exactly the match score.- Points obtained by a user if he predicts the winner.- Points obtained by a user if he predicts the score difference.- Lock time. Predictions submit by users are locked a "lock time" before the match starts. (start times obtained from API)5. Post news in a "polla".6. See the point table of all users in their "polla" based on predictions vs real scores rules.Super admin should be able to:1. Create, modify and delete administrators.(administrator attributes are: Name, email, associated groups, password)2. Define API update frequency during match, and off match time.

title: Create a mobile health app for both iphone and android devices
desc: 1. Home page- load an embedded html file that explain what is this app is about and etc (the html file will be provided)2. Drug reminder page- for patient to key in all their medications information, i.e.: name, dosage, method of administration, frequency and also the clinic that prescribed it- all medications added will be shown in a list, with a switch allow turning it on and off- they can set a schedule time to remind them to take the medications3. Self monitoring page- for patient to key in their health parameters, e.g.: blood pressure, blood sugar, weight, exercise log or dietary diary- the saved data can be view in either list or line graph format- the saved data can be exported in PDF format and emailed to the treating physician- the summary should contains patient's identifiers and statistics of all health parameters. - the goal BP and weight should be stated as well- other laboratory parameters, e.g.: hemoglobin, urea, creatinine, sodium, potassium and etc can be added4. Setting page- allow languages(3) selection (all translated strings will be provided)5. Forum/chat page- load a forum/online chat page (a ready link will be provided).Proposed GUI will be provided for better understanding of the project.

title: Xamarin.Forms Mobile App and API Complete Delivery
desc: Client requires a mobile app designed and developed in Xamarin Forms (for client end) and Loopback (nodejs) in server end; with web admin.SCOPEDevelop, design UI and test using Xamarin Forms a mobile application (Android and iOS) which allows the users to create poll/survey like games in which the user's can win virtual coins from participation. You will be required to assist in developing the backend API services (70% complete); you are also required to complete and wire up the calls the backend APIs and work with the API developers for functionality requests (Loopback JS framework).FUNCTIONALITYIn Xamarin Forms:1. User management features like user profile, avatar, password rests and login/registration and verification.2. Users can create a guessing/polling game in which other users of the app can participate in by paying the required virtual coins.3. Search, list, sort and filter games and users based on given criteria (jackpot size, number of players, player name, total number of likes/comments etc)4. Share, Comment and Like the game5. Track, Rank Players.6. Push Notifications on game status updates (new, rejected, ended), Followed player's actions, comments and likes7. Mobile phone contact list integration for searching friends to invite into the system8. Record and allow exchange of virtual coins for prize coupons.9. Payment functionality to purchase virtual coins with Paypal or Credit card, and in-app purchase10. Testing and Documentation for DeliveryFURTHER BACKGROUND-The full requirement and specification document will be discussed with the successful bidder.-For the right developer this will turn into a stable long term partnership with further modular work-IP and copyrights will be unconditionally assigned to us-Sub contractors need not apply.PAYMENT:-Milestone payments will be created on progress.-Contract must be signed in order for project to be regarded as completed.-Release of payments only on completion of project, not for achieving milestones (this includes post deployment period in which we will need to ensure your developed functionality is free from defect and functions as required)-Full payment will be released to you within 5 business days after the project is satisfied, approved and contract signed.Mention in your reply: "XAMARIN+NODEJS+API" so we know you've read the project brief.PS: Preference if you could also read Chinese

title: Poll Like Mobile App in Xamarin and API Complete Delivery
desc: Client requires a mobile app designed and developed in Xamarin Forms (for client end) and Loopback (nodejs) in server end; with web admin.SCOPEDevelop, design UI and test using Xamarin Forms a mobile application (Android and iOS) which allows the users to create poll/survey like games in which the user's can win virtual coins from participation. You will be required to assist in developing the backend API services (70% complete); you are also required to complete and wire up the calls the backend APIs and work with the API developers for functionality requests (Loopback JS framework).FUNCTIONALITYIn Xamarin Forms:1. User management features like user profile, avatar, password rests and login/registration and verification.2. Users can create a guessing/polling game in which other users of the app can participate in by paying the required virtual coins.3. Search, list, sort and filter games and users based on given criteria (jackpot size, number of players, player name, total number of likes/comments etc)4. Share, Comment and Like the game5. Track, Rank Players.6. Push Notifications on game status updates (new, rejected, ended), Followed player's actions, comments and likes7. Mobile phone contact list integration for searching friends to invite into the system8. Record and allow exchange of virtual coins for prize coupons.9. Payment functionality to purchase virtual coins with Paypal or Credit card, and in-app purchase10. Testing and Documentation for DeliveryFURTHER BACKGROUND-The full requirement and specification document will be discussed with the successful bidder.-For the right developer this will turn into a stable long term partnership with further modular work-IP and copyrights will be unconditionally assigned to us-Sub contractors need not apply.PAYMENT:-Milestone payments will be created on progress.-Contract must be signed in order for project to be regarded as completed.-Release of payments only on completion of project, not for achieving milestones (this includes post deployment period in which we will need to ensure your developed functionality is free from defect and functions as required)-Full payment will be released to you within 5 business days after the project is satisfied, approved and contract signed.Mention in your reply: "XAMARIN+NODEJS+API" so we know you've read the project brief.PS: Preference if you could also read Chinese

title: An application that launches a video after boot on Android.
desc: This app runs on a 10" tablet with Android 6.0.1.The video file can be anywhere on tablet SDcard.The video format is an Android standard MP4.After booting the tablet, the video must be launched automatically since the tactile surface on tablet will be inhibited. Then video loops definitively.I need it to be done today.

title: Client statistics application for a recycling company
desc: WastePlan is looking to re-develop its Client statistics portal; which includes a number of statistics (charts & tables), downloadable files, contact information and more.The application should be web-based and optimized for both mobile and desktop users.Two API's will be provided, one for client login and the other to deliver the raw data on which the statistics are based. The API result structure will be JSON-based.The project should include the below:- A dashboard with multiple charts- detailed comparative statistics on a weekly and monthly basis- a list of downloadable files- a list of contact people- a sustainability report- a list of recent collections- a comparative table of rebate per materialThe project has already been commenced as a POC, but the developer may start the project from scratch. The screenshots attached might provide a better overview of what is required (preferably in a nicer layout)Please quote with an hourly rate, and an estimated total amount of hours.We'd like to have a ceiling on the amount of hours it would take as well, as we have a budget to stick to.

title: Data Entry Person to test apps (Prefer South African)
desc: Hi,I need somebody with android and iphone to test our mobile apps. I would prefer a team of data entry. Each app testing may take 3 min to 7 min depending on the user experience with browsing and data entry.There is no technical experience required required for this job. Anybody with bigger circle of friends and family with have the bigger advantage.Once Ist job is completed successfully we will invite for monthly app testing.Thanks & Regards,Mike

title: B4A  - If you know this or willing to work with it and have good VB.Net skills I have a project for you.
desc: B4A is a framework that is for the most part similar to VB.Net but it is used to create mobile apps. It is a mobile cross platform development environment similar to XamarinI want to use B4A to create a similar Email app to K9 which is an open source Android app available on Github and which I have source code for so you can see how it works.The app is an email client. You can also look at Blue Mail as one example of the objective.[url removed, login to view]I have B4A fully licensed and can provide a copy of that. B4A already contains many Libraries and users have also contributed their Libraries.
